two types of models.from sentence:
We train two types of models .
The first one is an RNN Encoder - Decoder ( RNNencdec , , and the other is the proposed model , to which we refer as RNNsearch .

each model twice.from sentence: We train each model twice : first with the sentences of length up to 30 words ( RNNencdec - 30 , RNNsearch - 30 ) and then with the sentences of length up to 50 word ( RNNencdec - 50 , RNNsearch - 50 ) .

of.from sentence: The encoder and decoder of the RNNencdec have 1000 hidden units each .

encoder of.from sentence: The encoder of the RNNsearch consists of forward and backward recurrent neural networks ( RNN ) each having 1000 hidden units .

has.from sentence: It s decoder has 1000 hidden units .

use.from sentence: In both cases , we use a multilayer network with a single maxout hidden layer to compute the conditional probability of each target word .
